duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide overall support for project execution including root cause analysis, project set up, contract review, schedule evaluation, cost reports, technical evaluations, contractor work scope development, on-site construction progress audit, project status presentations, OAC meetings, change order administration, project schedule management, damages quantification, project QA/QC processes, and project close out.

education_certification.credential: B.S. in Engineering or Construction Management or equivalent work experience
